segments.text: I only want a little off the top and the sides and back to have clean lines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Is your hair naturally curly or is it a perm ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's natural . My friend told me you know how to work with curls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's my specialty . Let me put this around your neck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any product that controls frizz ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: With the cut I'll give you , we will minimize a lot of that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And when we're done , I'll show you some great stuff to take care of the rest .
segments.speaker: S2
